prompt: Chiikawastyle,Usagi,This is a digital drawing featuring Usagi, a cute, cartoonish rabbit with a round face and large, expressive eyes. Usagi has light yellow fur with pink blush marks on its cheeks. It is holding two small, white, fluffy creatures in its paws. One creature has a blue bow on its head, and both have pink blush marks on their cheeks. The background is a soft yellow square, and there is a small, white, heart-shaped speech bubble in the top right corner. The overall style is kawaii, characterized by its pastel colors and simple, rounded shapes.
